item.title: Re: Best way to get in the top 3?
item.content:encoded:
I actually updated my word document as more of a guide:http://docs.google.com/Doc?id=dgsms2qg_0dgsd7sfr

How to get Sannin or Top Daily Player:

Introduction:
This guide is to collect all information needed to achieve Sannin or top daily player into one nice little page for use in Billy vs Snakeman

Team:
In S1, best team would be Pinky2, Panda, Timmy2 (if you can run A-Ranks without any range booster). If you need the range, swap Emo3 for Pinky2.
In S2, best team would be Tea, Panda2, Timmy2 (again, if you can do A-Ranks without a range ally). If you need the range, swap Emo3 for Timmy2.

Need to Get:
Required:
Snakeman, J-Diddy, The Rack
Captain's Jacket
Hollow Leg
Timmy level 2
Arena Favorite
Aura of Experience or Letter of Marque
Two Super Potions (100 stamina each) or Two Ultra Elixirs (60 stamina each)
100 smokebombs (more if possible)
Get Anon's Obsessive Insight
Heck Butterfly
Swallowtail Butterfly
Professor's Hat
Dog Collar
Monster Mask

Recommended things to get:
40,000/120,000/240,000/400,00 ryo for throwing all out bashes
400,000 jxp for 100 Stamina from Teriyaki Ramen
Get The Rack's Hottie Regeneration (+100 Stamina)
49/99/149/199/249/299 spar ready (extra stamina for hitting the next number listed in order)
Go Piece from the Go Players Kaiju
Note Rush (bingo'ing with Trade lvl. 2)
The Flip Out Battle Theme (Season 2)
Persocom (Kaiju drop)

Bonuses:
+10% XP (Captain's Jacket)
+10% XP (Aura of Experience or Letter of Marque)
+20% XP (Timmy lvl. 2)
+30% XP (Pandabear)
+15% XP (Arena Favorite)
+10% XP (Ancient Teachings)
+50% XP (Obsessive Insight)
Total Bonsu:XP * 3.581721 (XP * 1.1 * 1.1 * 1.2 * 1.3 * 1.15 * 1.1 * 1.5)
Total Bonus w/ note rush: XP * 4.2980652 (XP * 3.581721 * 1.2)

Other Recommendations for bonuses:
+21% Red-Eye Bloodline
+50% Mister Tea
+10% Go Piece

Total Stamina:
Base: 210
Items: 50
Village: 80 (all special village upgrades)
Bonuses: 180 (7/14/21 day streak, top web game bonus, and extra bonus link)
Special Quest: 190(220-30)
Potions:200 or 120
Jutsu: 100 (Hottie Regen)
Sparring: 100/200 (depends on spar total)
Referrel bonus: 100 (20 clicks)
Legacy: 60 (special jonin and jonin)
Total: 570 - 1390 (total stamina depends on items used, Recommended is ~1000 stamina on attempt day)

Steps:
1. Get all 3 bonuses (7,14,21 day stamina bonus, Top Web Games bonus, picture one) (180 Stamina)
2. Run A-Rank Missions with Timmy 2, Emo 3, Pandabear
3. Smoke Bomb Out of High Range Missions (Billy lvl. 3 mission is usually not possible with spamming Obsessive Insight)
4. Smoke Bomb Low Level Gen Missions
5. SPAM OBSESSIVE INSIGHT
6. (optional) Do Hairpin Quest with 30 stamina left (max Stamina again)
7. Chug two potions (Super Potions or Ultra Elixirs) (+200 or +120 stamina)
8. (optional) When out of stamina on last mission use hottie regeneration (+100 stamina)

Cited/Compiled Information From:
Zhor, Prinny Bomber Extraordinar, rmlurker, cc-chan, Universum, Celeste, Strider Hiryu, Kaede, geff, McMasters all from the Power AP/XP Guide on the Imaginary Village forums
Uzuki, Brightmorn, Fax

item.title: Re: Best way to get in the top 3?
item.content:encoded: Starting the hairpin mission the day before might not be optimal. You'd have to sell your blueflower hairpin, which means you'd be charging at a higher cost if you're not hanging with Anonymous. If you're hanging with anonymous, then it's a non-issue. Otherwise, it's a matter of whether you will be charging >15 times before you get to the hairpin mission. If you will be, then starting it the day before results in a loss of stamina. Otherwise, it's ideal.

item.title: Re: Best way to get in the top 3?

item.title: Re: Best way to get in the top 3?
item.content:encoded:
Everything that was said in the two previous posts is correct, with one minor correction. Super Potions (+100 stamina) tend to be better than Silver Elixirs (+100k XP) if you're averaging more than 10k exp per A-Rank. This will require some experimentation to see if this is the case.

In S1, best team would be Pinky2, Panda, Timmy2 (if you can run A-Ranks without any range booster). If you need the range, swap Emo3 for Pinky2.

In S2, best team would be Tea, Panda2, Timmy2 (again, if you can do A-Ranks without a range ally). If you need the range, swap Emo3 for Timmy2.

Hanging out with Anonymous the day you do your run would be good, if possible, since you'll want to use obsessive insight on every mission.

item.title: Re: Best way to get in the top 3?
item.content:encoded:
Some Additions:

Go a week beforehand without using the top 50 games bonus so that it's available
If you're 2nd+ season, make sure you're on the Flipping Out theme, as the Teacher's Pet theme doesn't help.
If your village has Ninja Ambassadors, and you can handle it, be sure to do your daily S-Rank mission, even if you can't pull it off with Obsessive Insight.
If you have a Ninja Valentine, be sure to have them in your party the day before, then switch to your XP Team. Also do this with LisaLisa if you have her.
The best XP allies are probably Timmy Lvl 2 (bonus XP), Stalkergirl Lvl 2 (Missions Cost less), and Pinky Lvl 2 (Missions cost less, Chakra cost bonus) (Season 1) or Timmy Lvl 2, Mr Tea (Ranking XP bonus), Pinky Lvl 2 (Season 2+)

In order of usefulness: Golden Potions (+250 Stamina), Silver Elixers, Super Potions, Ultra Elixers

item.title: Re: Best way to get in the top 3?
item.content:encoded:
Well a guide would both help and hurt. It would help you get higher numbers, however it would also increase your competition for top 3 (seeing as everyone would be using the same guide).

A guideline:
Make your attempt on a 7,14, or 21 day for the extra STA
Win 3, 6, 9 times in the Arena (for 20, 40, 60 STA)
Run A-rank missions and use Obsessive Insight every chance you can get!
If you have access to Ramen use: Teriyaki Ramen (I did not)
If you have 3 Hairpin Pieces when you get below 40sta (above 30) do the mission The Princess and the Dragon
When you have under 20sta (above 10) Hottie Regeneration (make sure you have a minimum of 200chakra left!)

Potion options:
With Hallow Jaw use 2 of the following in any combo, in order of preference:
Silver Elixir - +100,000 Daily XP Ranking
Super Potion - +100 STA (Season 2+ only!)
Ultra Elixir - +60 STA

Hope that helps out!

And Uzuki if you want any help with that checklist, you know where to find me :)

item.title: Re: Best way to get in the top 3?
item.content:encoded:
It wouldn't be a guide, so much as a checklist, but I'll think about writing something up. In the mean time, your goal is to be able to stack as many +xp% bonuses and as many stamina bonuses as you can.

I'd recommend looking at this site to figure out what kind of bonuses are possible.
